messages.messageBody:
We have my oldest son on video telling us we can't use that "cinderella"
because it's grandpa's (It was an umbrella ;o)

Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: funny sayings from the young
messages.msgSnippet: My 2 yr old nephew woke up from his nap and demanded boobies.Now since he was only breastfed for about 4 wks I was shocked to hear this. I kept thinking he was
messages.messageBody:
My 2 yr old nephew woke up from his nap and demanded boobies.Now since he was only breastfed for about 4 wks I was shocked to hear this. I kept thinking he was saying something else.My kids tried to help me but they figured he was asking for breastmilk to. After much puzzlement he got off the chair and headed for the freezer to show the boobies. Blueberries. I was happy to comply as it had been 2 years since I had nursed anyone and I didn't think I could manage this <grin>


Maureen Thomas
http://www.stillwaters.ca


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
